shrimath jon kothalawala aarakshaka wishwawidyalaye 2017 upadhi pradanothsawaya shrimath jon kothalawala aarakshaka wishwawidyalaye 2017 warshaye upadhi pradanothsawaya 2017 desambar masa 11 saha 12 yana dedina thula bandaranayaka jathyanthara sammanthrana shalawe di athi uthkarshawath andamin pawath wu athara desambar masa 12 wana dina pawathi awasan sasiye pradhana aaradhitha amuththa washayen shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye athigaru janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mathithuma sahabhagi wiya.
wena ma naithika pudgalathwayak pawathima nisa wisheshayen ma kuda pawul samagam samba

anikuth amudrawyath ekaparama genawa tenwil lori walinma.
mata nam yali yalidu hangenne ohuge siyalu nirmana athurin ee nirmana wadalath shreshta wi athi bawayi.
wisheshayen nirmanaya karana lada aakruthi pathraya oba rusiyanu wishrama watup aramudale rakshana sahathikaya, ilektronika kotuwa lipinaya siyalu wisthara sandahan kala yuthuyi.
ee sadde hondata andurana gedara pusa parata diwwa.

mithotamulla kasala kanda naya yamen niwasa ahimi wuwanta niwasa labadime wadasatahane dewana adiyara yatathe purna haniyata path niwasa 65 ka padinchi karuwan wenuwen nawa niwasa labadima janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithumage pa්radhanathwayen ada (25) paswaruwe aapada kalamanakarana amathyansha sha්rawanagaraye di sidu wiya.

thama wyaparaya pu`pal kirimata unandu wana kshradra mulya wyapara wala nirathawena wyawasayakayin, gramiya bala pradeshayanhi athi sampath aarthika kirayakarakam saha nawa wyaparika adahas athi wyawasayakayin saha tharuna upadhidharin, kanthawan saha aabadhitha tharuna kotas mema naya yojana kramaya thulin balaganwimata apeksha kere.

palali athulu hamuda kandawuru wala sitina bhata sena wenath than walata gena gos mul ayithi karuwan siya janma bhumiye padinchi kirime hakiyawa pilibandawa soya balamin sitina bawa shri lanka aanduwa pawasayi.jiniwa nuwaradi eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalaya hamuwe prakashayak kala jiniwa nuwara sitina eksath jathinge shri lankawe nithya niyojitha rawinatha aaryasinha palali guwan thotupala ha kankasanthure waraya pulul kirima sandaha idam lakunu kota athayi danum dunneya.idam ahimi wannan wenuwen wandi saha yabada pradeshayen wikalpa idam laba dena bawada sanduda aarambha wu manawa himikam mandalaye wisi thun wani sasi waraya amathamin ohu kiya sitiyeya.yuddhayen unhiti than ahimiwu siyaluma dena mulumaninma padinchi karawa hamara bawath shri lanka rajaya eksath jathin hamuwe prakasha kota sitiyeya.ikuth wasare sapthambaraya wanawita yuda anathayan athurin awasana kandayama mulathiw hi yali padinchi karawu athara wisi hathara dahasakata adhika pirisak anugrahaka niwasa walata gos athi bawayi rawinatha aaryasiha prakasha kale.ee anuwa samajagatha kota athi mulu pirisa 295,873 k bawada, shri lanka dutha mandalaye pradhani aariyasinha manawa himikam mandalaya ta danum dunneya.yuddhaya hamara wu bawa rajaya wisin prakashayata path karana awasthawe warga kilomitara dedahasakata wadi bhumi pramanayaka walala thibu bim bomba dan aththe warga kilo mitara siyayakatath adu idaka yayida ohu thawa duratath kiya sitiyeya.
